Detailed Description

V2Protocol handler, to process V2 Protocol commands used in Atmel programmer devices.

Define Documentation

#define INCLUDE_FROM_V2PROTOCOL_C

Function Documentation

static void V2Protocol_Command_ChipErase ( void   )  [static]

Handler for the CMD_CHI_ERASE_ISP command, clearing the target's FLASH memory.

static void V2Protocol_Command_EnterISPMode ( void   )  [static]

Handler for the CMD_ENTER_PROGMODE_ISP command, which attempts to enter programming mode on the attached device, returning success or failure back to the host.

static void V2Protocol_Command_GetSetParam ( uint8_t  V2Command  )  [static]

Handler for the CMD_SET_PARAMETER and CMD_GET_PARAMETER commands from the host, setting or getting a device parameter's value from the parameter table.

Parameters:
[in] V2Command Issued V2 Protocol command byte from the host
static void V2Protocol_Command_LeaveISPMode ( void   )  [static]

Handler for the CMD_LEAVE_ISP command, which releases the target from programming mode.

static void V2Protocol_Command_LoadAddress ( void   )  [static]

Handler for the CMD_LOAD_ADDRESS command, loading the given device address into a global storage variable for later use, and issuing LOAD EXTENDED ADDRESS commands to the attached device as required.

static void V2Protocol_Command_ProgramMemory ( uint8_t  V2Command  )  [static]

Handler for the CMD_PROGRAM_FLASH_ISP and CMD_PROGRAM_EEPROM_ISP commands, writing out bytes, words or pages of data to the attached device.

Parameters:
[in] V2Command Issued V2 Protocol command byte from the host
static void V2Protocol_Command_ReadFuseLockSigOSCCAL ( uint8_t  V2Command  )  [static]

Handler for the CMD_READ_FUSE_ISP, CMD_READ_LOCK_ISP, CMD_READ_SIGNATURE_ISP and CMD_READ_OSCCAL commands, reading the requested configuration byte from the device.

Parameters:
[in] V2Command Issued V2 Protocol command byte from the host
static void V2Protocol_Command_ReadMemory ( uint8_t  V2Command  )  [static]

Handler for the CMD_READ_FLASH_ISP and CMD_READ_EEPROM_ISP commands, reading in bytes, words or pages of data from the attached device.

Parameters:
[in] V2Command Issued V2 Protocol command byte from the host
static void V2Protocol_Command_ResetProtection ( void   )  [static]

Handler for the CMD_RESET_PROTECTION command, currently implemented as a dummy ACK function as no ISP short-circuit protection is currently implemented.

static void V2Protocol_Command_SignOn ( void   )  [static]

Handler for the CMD_SIGN_ON command, returning the programmer ID string to the host.

static void V2Protocol_Command_SPIMulti ( void   )  [static]

Handler for the CMD_SPI_MULTI command, writing and reading arbitrary SPI data to and from the attached device.

static void V2Protocol_Command_Unknown ( uint8_t  V2Command  )  [static]

Handler for unknown V2 protocol commands. This discards all sent data and returns a STATUS_CMD_UNKNOWN status back to the host.

Parameters:
[in] V2Command Issued V2 Protocol command byte from the host
static void V2Protocol_Command_WriteFuseLock ( uint8_t  V2Command  )  [static]

Handler for the CMD_WRITE_FUSE_ISP and CMD_WRITE_LOCK_ISP commands, writing the requested configuration byte to the device.

Parameters:
[in] V2Command Issued V2 Protocol command byte from the host
void V2Protocol_ProcessCommand ( void   ) 

Master V2 Protocol packet handler, for received V2 Protocol packets from a connected host. This routine decodes the issued command and passes off the handling of the command to the appropriate function.
